{{cpp/io/basic_streambuf/title|gbump}}
{{cpp/io/basic_streambuf/navbar}}
{{ddcl|1=
protected:
void gbump( int count );
}}

Skips {{c|count}} characters in the get area. This is done by adding {{c|count}} to the ''get pointer''. No checks are done for underflow.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|count|number of characters to skip}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Notes===
Because this function takes an {{c|int}}, it cannot manipulate buffers larger than {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;int&gt;::max()}} characters ({{lwg|255}}).
